basics.label: I am a highly skilled professional committed to excellence in job performance.
basics.summary1: My ability to establish strong interpersonal relationships is reflected in my capacity to provide exceptional customer service. I am distinguished by my integrity, responsibility, and punctuality, qualities that ensure reliable and consistent performance in any work environment.
basics.summary2: I possess an analytical and proactive mindset, with a natural ability to lead teams and solve problems efficiently. My commitment to the highest ethical and moral standards guides me in every task I undertake, ensuring professional conduct and respectful treatment of colleagues and clients alike.
basics.summary3: I am constantly seeking opportunities to expand my knowledge and enhance my skills. My focus on continuous learning enables me to quickly adapt to changes and stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the BPO and Call Center field.

work.name: IGT solutions
work.summary: I was responsible for providing support to the Priceline team, handling escalated cases and ensuring customer satisfaction. I also provided training and support to new team members, and collaborated with the Quality Assurance team to ensure compliance with company standards and procedures.

work.name: Contact Point 360
work.summary: I was in charge of managing claims and providing assistance to clients, ensuring that their issues were resolved in a timely and satisfactory manner to guarantee their full satisfaction. Additionally, I worked closely to continuously improve our services and maintain high standards of customer care.
